summary: This FBI 302 report documents the seizure of 18 hard drives from the CCTV system server rack at the Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC) in New York on August 10, 2019. The drives were handed over by an MCC Electronics Technician to an FBI Special Agent, with an FD-597 form completed for the transfer.

connections.description: ET handed over seized hard drives to SA, and SA provided ET with a copy of the FD-597 form documenting the transfer.

events.title: Seizure of CCTV Hard Drives from MCC
events.description: FBI Special Agent seized 18 hard drives from the CCTV system server rack at the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York. The drives were removed by an MCC Electronics Technician and transferred with documentation.

locations: Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC), 150 Park Row, New York, NY
New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: On August 10, 2019, the FBI seized 18 hard drives from the CCTV system at the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York.
The hard drives were removed from a NICE VISION PRO CCTV system server rack by an MCC Electronics Technician.
An FD-597 form was completed to document the seizure and a copy was provided to the Electronics Technician.
The seizure occurred while Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at the MCC prior to his death.
The document is an FBI 302 report dated August 15, 2019, documenting the evidence collection procedure.
